title: Bug 104630 - Column icons don't show up in connecting Derby database
description: Upon connecting to a Derby database, column icons are not displayed in the Available Items sector.
OB: When expanding the Data Source in the Available Items sector by clicking the related icon, the column icons do not show up.
EB: Expected behavior is that when expanding the Data Source in the Available Items sector by clicking the related icon, both table icons and column icons should be displayed.
SR:
1. Open the application and connect to a Derby database.
2. Navigate to the Available Items sector.
3. Expand the Data Source by clicking the related icon.
4. Observe that the column icons are not displayed as expected.
